title: Creamy Sun Dried Tomato Chicken & Spinach

ingredients.name: roughly chopped sun-dried tomatoes in oil

preparations: Get foil ready to use as a tent over the chicken on a plate
Add red pepper to a container
Add chicken broth to a measuring cup
Add sun-dried tomatoes to a measuring cup
Add heavy cream to a measuring cup
instructions: Heat butter and olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
When hot, add the chicken to the pan and season with salt and pepper.
Cook for 7 minutes, flip, and cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until chicken registers 165 degress with a mean thermometer.
Remove chicken from the pan, and tent with foil on a plate.
Add spinach to the pan, and season with red pepper flakes.
Saute until wilted, and add the broth, tomatoes, and heavy cream to the pan.
Bring to a light simmer and add chicken breasts back to the pan.
